segments.text: I see the boy balancing on the stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, and he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl standing right there, waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should turn around and see what’s happening before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will fall and hurt himself before anyone notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so focused on the cookies that she doesn’t even see the water spreading toward her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this whole scene is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
